Name: Bots 'n Tots
Desc:
Installs a Bots 'n Tots that periodically summons Toy Robots. Summoned Toy Robots detect nearby enemies and triggers a self-destruct function or at the end of its duration. The factory itself also self-destructs at the end of its duration to deal damage.
This skill does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 100. Installs a Robo Factory for 70 sec. Summons 3 Toy Robots every 3 sec. At the end of the duration, the factory self-destructs at 1000% Damage.
Toy Robots self-destruct at 500% Damage.
H.New:
MP Cost: 100. Installs a Robot Factory for 70 sec.
Summons 3 Toy Robots every 3 sec. that explode and attack up to 4 enemies at 500% Damage. The Robot Factory explodes upon expiration, attacking up to 6 enemies at 1000% Damage.
